Method Detail

loadGame

public LiveSimulator loadGame(java.lang.String gameName,
                              java.lang.String[] parameters,
                              boolean testMode,
                              java.lang.String resultFile)
                       throws CowException
Loads the game specified by the given name.

Parameters:
gameName - the game name.
parameters - the game parameters.
testMode - tells whether the game is in test mode or secure mode.
resultFile - the file to save the match result in.
Returns:
the game live simulator.
Throws:
CowException - if the game cannot be loaded.

loadReplay

public ReplaySimulator loadReplay(java.lang.String gameName,
                                  java.lang.String replayName)
                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                  java.io.IOException
Loads the specified replay, for the specified game.

Parameters:
gameName - the game name.
replayName - the replay name.
Returns:
the game replay simulator;
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the game or replay does not exist.
java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while loading the replay.

play

public void play()
Resumes the game if if it is paused or in step by step mode (state set to PLAYING). Starts the game if not already done.

pause

public void pause()
Pauses the game if it is not stopped (state set to PAUSED). Starts the game if not already done.

nextFrame

public void nextFrame()
Plays one frame of the game (state set to WAITING_FRAME). Starts the game if not already done.

stopGame

public void stopGame()
Stops the game if not already done (state set to STOPPED).

public void setFrame()
Sets a game frame, managing the sleep time if needed.
